text: Santo Tomas City, Batangas is a 1st class component city in the province of Batangas, The city is named of patron Saint Tomas, It borders the Calamba City, Los Ba√±os, Tanauan and Malvar. Santo Tomas City is a vast city, it numerous residential and industrial outside Metro Manila and Urban Laguna. ==Reference== Category:Cities in the Philippines Category:Batangas
title: Santo Tomas, Batangas
